programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de eerste aflevering staat de hoekschop centraal. Wat is het geheim van een goede hoekschop en waarom veert het thuispubliek altijd op terwijl maar 4 procent van alle hoekschoppen een goal oplevert? Met hulp van o.a. analyticus Arnold Bruggink, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én cornerspecialist Nourdin Boukhari gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de eerste aflevering staat de hoekschop centraal. Wat is het geheim van een goede hoekschop en waarom veert het thuispubliek altijd op terwijl maar 4 procent van alle hoekschoppen een goal oplevert? Met hulp van o.a. analyticus Arnold Bruggink, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én cornerspecialist Nourdin Boukhari gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

Wat is het geheim van een goede hoekschop en waarom veert het thuispubliek altijd op terwijl maar 4 procent van alle hoekschoppen een goal oplevert? Met hulp van o.a. analyticus Arnold Bruggink, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én cornerspecialist Nourdin Boukhari gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.desc: S3 Ep16 Speciale - Le squadre si sfidano in due grandi prove di costruzione con mattoni, e la vincitrice si aggiudica 20.000 dollari in donazioni di beneficenza.

programme.title: Ep. 4
programme.desc: S3 Ep4 - Un ex maggiordomo della famiglia reale inglese spiega le regole dell'etichetta a Eamonn e Ruth. In seguito, i due partecipano all'esclusivo ballo delle debuttanti.

programme.title: Ep. 5
programme.desc: S3 Ep2 - Eamonn e Ruth incontrano alcune persone benestanti per scoprire come hanno realizzato le loro fortune. I due ricevono preziosi consigli dall'uomo che afferma di essere il life coach piu' pagato del mondo.

programme.desc: Dall'Auditorium Multimediale di RDS, l'energia e il sound unico di Irama in un esclusivo appuntamento con la musica live.

programme.title: Val Pusteria: atmosfere tirolesi
programme.desc: S4 Ep13 Val Pusteria: atmosfere tirolesi - Francesco e Silvia vogliono acquistare una casa in Trentino, in Val Pusteria. Ciaspole ai piedi, Giulia e Nicola li porteranno nella striscia che collega Bressanone a Sesto.

programme.title: Valle d'Aosta: una regione in miniatura
programme.desc: S4 Ep14 Valle d'Aosta: Una regione in miniatura - Silverio e Sabrina vogliono acquistare una seconda casa tra le vette della Valle d'Aosta. Giulia e Nicola si sfidano fra castelli e ghiacciai, tra Courmayeur e La Salle.

DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The concluding round of the Alfred Dunhill Championship, a DP World Tour event held at Royal Johannesburg Club in South Africa. (14.12)

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, the climactic event of the Ladies European Tour season taking place at Real Guadalhorce Club de Golf.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2019 Highlights
programme.desc: Day three of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open on the European Tour from the Heritage Golf Club in Mauritius.

programme.title: Players Championship 2013 Film
programme.desc: The story of the 2013 Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida. America's Matt Kuchar came out on top in the 2012 tournament.

programme.title: Best of The Hero Masterclasses
programme.desc: Highlights from Sky's series of masterclasses with leading golf professionals.

programme.title: Best of The Shot Centre
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best moments from the Sky Sports Shot Zone.

programme.title: Golf Academy
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, Tony Jacklin offers tips on the short game.

programme.title: Annika Sorenstam - Mental Focus
programme.desc: The Golf Academy returns with more tips and tricks to help you improve your golfing game. Here, Annika Sorenstam on the way to maintain mental focus.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Greg Norman
programme.desc: Born down under, Greg Norman was twice Open Champion and dominated golf for a decade. Always charismatic, at times controversial, he won 91 titles worldwide.

programme.title: Asian Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Saudi Open - taking place at Dirab Golf and Country Club - on the Asian Tour, the official sanctioning body for professional golf in the region.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Grant Thornton Invitational - the final PGA Tour event of the year - taking place at Tiburón Golf Club in Naples, Florida.

programme.title: Live DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day one of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: A look at one of The Open's champions, Rory McIlroy. From Northern Ireland, McIlroy dreamed of winning The Open, a feat he achieved in 2014 with victory at Royal Liverpool.

programme.title: Legends Tour Golf Magazine
programme.desc: Firmly established on the Legends Tour calendar, a look at the MCB Mauritius Legends - held at Constance Belle Mare Plage.

programme.title: The Golf Channel Games Highlights
programme.desc: At Trump National Golf Club, Team Rory McIlroy goes up against Team Scottie Scheffler during the Golf Channel Games - a new rapid-fire competition including a number of challenges.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day one of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing.

programme.title: The Golf Channel Games Highlights
programme.desc: At Trump National Golf Club, Team Rory McIlroy goes up against Team Scottie Scheffler during the Golf Channel Games - a new rapid-fire competition including a number of challenges.

programme.title: Open Championship Film 2024
programme.desc: The official film of the 152nd Open at Royal Troon, where Xander Schauffele separated himself from the rest of the field to become Champion Golfer of the Year.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2024
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone during 2024.

programme.title: Women's Open Masterclass
programme.desc: Ahead of the year's final women's Major at Carnoustie, join 2018 champion Georgia Hall, Emily Pedersen, Annabel Dimmock and Solheim Cup captain Catriona Matthew for insight into their game.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2022 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth day of the 2022 Afrasia Bank Mauritius Open, taking place at Mont Choisy Le Golf. Frenchman Antoine Rozner takes a two-stroke lead into the final round. (18.12)

programme.title: Players Championship 2015 Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2015 Players Championship from the Stadium Course at TPC Sawgrass. Martin Kaymer of Germany returned as the defending champion from 2014.

programme.title: The Golf Fitness Show
programme.desc: An often-overlooked part of golf, fitness can improve your game in all sorts of ways. The Golf Fitness Show demonstrates the perfect exercises for the course.

programme.title: Mark Roe's Short Game School
programme.desc: Former European Tour player Mark Roe travels to Trentino in northern Italy to give tips to the amateur golfer on how to improve their short game.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Sorenstam Bunker
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game from the tee to the green. Here, golf star Annika Sörenstam gives advice on improving your bunker play.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Faldo Iron Game
programme.desc: The Golf Academy offers guidance on how to make your golfing game even stronger. Here, Major champion Sir Nick Faldo reveals the secrets of good iron game. Ep. 2.

programme.title: Chronicles of a Champion Golfer...
programme.desc: A look at a champion golfer at the world's pre-eminent Major, The Open. Here, look at the achievements of Scotsman Sandy Lyle, who was victorious at Royal St George's in 1985.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Monty Bunker Play
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, Colin Montgomerie offers some tips on bunker play.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Sorenstam Driver
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game from the tee to the green. Here, golf star Annika Sorenstam offers advice on how best to use the driver.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, the climactic event of the Ladies European Tour season taking place at Real Guadalhorce Club de Golf.

programme.title: Live DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day two of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing.

programme.title: Open Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 153rd Open Championship. Taking place at Royal Portrush in Northern Ireland, Scottie Scheffler became champion golfer of the year for the first time in his career.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer...
programme.desc: A look at one of The Open's great champions. Here, the story of golfing legend Gary Player, who won Open Championships across three different decades among his many achievements.

programme.title: Players Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach. It would take a play-off between JJ Spaun and Rory McIlroy to decide the fate of the 51st edition.

programme.title: Open Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 153rd Open Championship. Taking place at Royal Portrush in Northern Ireland, Scottie Scheffler became champion golfer of the year for the first time in his career.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day two of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing.

programme.title: ANWA Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Augusta National Women's Amateur, as an international field of top women's amateur golfers convened at the world-famous venue.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Films
programme.desc: The official film of the 2024 US Open from Pinehurst, the scene of Bryson DeChambeau's triumph and Rory McIlroy's heartbreak.

programme.title: ATP Final: Barcelona
programme.desc: Bidding for his second title in seven days, world number two Carlos Alcaraz sets his sights on his third Barcelona Open win, facing Denmark's Holger Rune in the final. (20.04)

programme.title: Serena v Azarenka 2012
programme.desc: After three sets of gruelling competition in the 2012 final of the women's singles, Serena Williams defeated Victoria Azarenka in the first of two back-to-back finals at the US Open.

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the best moments from Jack Draper's 2024 season, including tournament wins in Stuttgart and Vienna.

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: British number one Katie Boulter looks to win her first WTA 500 title as she takes on Marta Kostyuk in the final of the San Diego Open. Kostyuk knocked out the top seed to get here. (03.03)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of men's British number one Jack Draper's first ATP 500 final, as the US Open semi-finalist fought Karen Khachanov for the Erste Bank Open trophy in Vienna. (27.10)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: Jack Draper goes for his first ATP Tour title as the Brit competes in the Stuttgart final against a former Wimbledon finalist and two-time champion here, Matteo Berrettini. (16.06)

programme.title: Robson v Na 2012
programme.desc: Having defeated a three-time US Open champion in the second round, Great Britain's Laura Robson came up against China's Li Na in the third round of the women's singles at the 2012 US Open.

programme.title: US Open Men's Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz play out the next chapter in their rivalry as the reigning champion and the 2022 winner compete for the US Open crown in New York. (07.09)

programme.title: US Open Women's Final
programme.desc: Amanda Anisimova, the home favourite, faces Aryna Sabalenka, the defending US Open champion, as the American competes in her second consecutive Grand Slam final. (06.09)

programme.title: ATP Tokyo 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Japan Open, an ATP Tour 500 event staged in Tokyo.

programme.title: ATP Next Gen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the third day of play at the 2025 Next Gen ATP Finals, held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: ATP Next Gen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the third day of play at the 2025 Next Gen ATP Finals, held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: ATP Final: Toronto
programme.desc: Ben Shelton features in his first ATP Masters final as the 22-year-old eyes world number six status against Karen Khachanov, who ends a seven-year wait to compete on this stage. (07.08)

programme.title: WTA Final: Montreal
